scripts.preview: npx opennextjs-cloudflare build && npx opennextjs-cloudflare preview
scripts.db:migrate: npx wrangler d1 execute map-db --local --file=../drizzle/migrations/0001_init.sql && npx wrangler d1 execute map-db --local --file=../drizzle/migrations/0002_map_pins.sql && npx wrangler d1 execute map-db --local --file=../drizzle/migrations/0003_email_verification.sql
scripts.db:migrate:prod: npx wrangler d1 execute map-db --remote --file=../drizzle/migrations/0001_init.sql && npx wrangler d1 execute map-db --remote --file=../drizzle/migrations/0002_map_pins.sql && npx wrangler d1 execute map-db --remote --file=../drizzle/migrations/0003_email_verification.sql
scripts.deploy: npx opennextjs-cloudflare build && npx opennextjs-cloudflare deploy
scripts.upload: npx opennextjs-cloudflare build && npx opennextjs-cloudflare upload
